traits.name: Afterstorm
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Deals a {3} {Wind} damage [Hit] to the attacker.'

traits.name: Concealed
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn, if this monster did not {attack} in this combat yet: Applies {Dodge} and {Shields} self for {0}.'

traits.name: Electrical Burn
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy reaches [5] {Burn} stacks: Deals a {Fire}/{Wind} [Hit] with {3} damage to that enemy and applies {Dodge} to self.'

traits.name: Evasion Mastery
traits.description: '{Crit Chance} on allies also increases their {Evasion} by {0%} of that amount.'

traits.name: Eye of the Storm
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Wind} or {Wild damage} dealt to enemies: Applies {Dodge} to each ally.'

traits.name: Haste
traits.description: '{Dodge} now only increases {Evasion} by {0%} per stack and doesn’t get consumed when attacked. After an ally’s turn, they consume {1} stacks of {Dodge} to {reactivate} their turn.'

traits.name: Martial Prowess
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Applies {Sidekick} to them. '

traits.name: Nimble Guardian
traits.description: 'Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self.'

traits.name: Perseverance
traits.description: 'Whenever a debuff is applied to an ally: {2%} chance to apply {Dodge} to them.'

traits.name: Serpentine Maneuvers
traits.description: 'For every {0} [Hits] evaded by your allies: Applies {Power} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Power}.'

traits.name: Shadow Meld
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Dodge} to that ally.'

traits.name: Tailwind
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally evades a [Hit]: Generates {Wind} Aether; if you have {3} or more {Wind} Aether, {Wild} Aether is generated instead. '

traits.name: Blind
traits.description: 'Enemies with {Terror} have a {0%} chance to miss each [Hit]. Whenever an enemy misses a [Hit]: Applies {Terror} to them.'

traits.name: Cosmic Horror
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Generates {Wild} [Aether] for every enemy with {C0} or more {Terror}.'

traits.name: Cursed
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {1} {Terror} to that enemy.'

traits.name: Eldritch Horror
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} {Age}: Applies {Terror} stacks to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Terror} equal to the total amount of {Age} on all allies.'

traits.name: Fear Toxin
traits.description: '{Poison} on enemies with {Terror} does {Wild Damage} and deals [1] extra damage for every {0} {Terror} stacks on the enemy.'

traits.name: Nightmare
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Deals a {Wild Damage} [Hit] with {3} damage to all enemies with {C0} or more {Terror}.'

traits.name: Panic
traits.description: 'Whenever a {Wild Damage} [Hit] staggers an enemy: {Purges} {0} enemy [Aether] and applies {1} {Terror} to each other enemy.'

traits.name: Peak Calamity
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally [attacks] an enemy with {0} or more {Terror}: Applies {Power} to that ally.'

traits.name: Slasher
traits.description: '{Attacks} of your allies increase the amount of {Terror} on the [attacked] enemies by {0%}, rounded up, instead of consuming stacks. At the end of your turn: {1%} of all {Terror} stacks on enemies are consumed, rounded up.'

traits.name: Tormentor
traits.description: '{On Interrupt}: Applies {0;1} {Terror} to that enemy and heals self for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Void Infusion
traits.description: Whenever {Wild Aether} is spent on an ally's {Action}, its second [Hit] does {Wild Damage}. If it's a {Support Action}, it applies {0} {Terror} to each enemy instead.

traits.name: Wild Fear
traits.description: '{Wild Damage} [Hits] of your allies gain +{0} {Poise Damage}.'

traits.name: Ascension
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing of your allies: Applies {1} {Power} to each ally.'

traits.name: Auto Heal
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Heals the ally with the lowest health by {2} x {1}.'

traits.name: Blood Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Water} [Hit] to all enemies; damage equals [1] for every {0} healing received by allies this round.'

traits.name: Cleanse Corruption
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally is healed to full health: Cleanses {1} {Corruption} from them.'

traits.name: Conversion Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Fire}/{Water} hit to all enemies; damage equals debuffs cleansed or consumed from allies this round.'

traits.name: Cosmic Healing
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing of your allies: Generates {1} {Wild} Aether.'

traits.name: First Aid
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is applied to an ally: Heals them for {1}.'

traits.name: Healing Hex
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Heals the ally with the lowest health for {1}.'

traits.name: Power Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to this monster: Heals each ally for {1}.'

traits.name: Quicken
traits.description: 'For every {0} healing this monster receives or applies to other monsters: Applies {Sidekick} to self.'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Synchronous Healing
traits.description: 'Whenever you reach {5} [Aether] of the same element: Heals all allies for {2} x {1}.'

types.name: TypeTerror
types.description: This Type focuses on Terror stacks, which increase damage from Attacks and help with breaking Poise.

types.name: TypeHeal
types.description: This Type focuses on healing allies and providing strong utility effects through healing.
